items.description: Communicated directly with clients during daily meetings and biweekly product presentations to maintain an excellent rapport, and keep an accurate view of the scope and direction of projects
Followed the SCRUM software development methodology in performing daily stand-up meetings to maintain consistent, effective communication with teammates and project leads
Architected and implemented important system features, while focusing on simplicity, maintainability, and code-reuse
Employed Test-Driven Development everywhere to ensure the creation of modular, robust code, and to incentivize code health
Spread knowledge through technical presentations and pair programming, bringing a positive impact to the company culture
Engineered solutions to problems affecting big industries such as Health, Medicine, Law, and Government
Maintained important responsibilities including communicating with prospective clients, upgrading existing production codebases, and gathering statistics for deployed products
Championed the use of unit testing and code review to aid in creating better products
Refactored existing solutions to ensure the safety and health of the company's products
Worked hard, taking accountability for my solutions and spending overtime hours when necessary to see deadlines met
